request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST \
  http://localhost:3000/soap/player \
  -H 'Content-Type: text/xml' \
  -H 'Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46cGFzc3dvcmQxMjM=' \
  -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/player-service">
   <soap:Body>
      <tns:createPlayerRequest>
         <name>Lionel Messi</name>
         <country>Argentina</country>
         <club>Inter Miami</club>
         <position>Forward</position>
         <age>36</age>
         <statistics>
            <season>2023-2024</season>
            <goals>15</goals>
            <assists>10</assists>
            <matches>20</matches>
            <yellowCards>2</yellowCards>
            <redCards>0</redCards>
            <minutesPlayed>1800</minutesPlayed>
         </statistics>
      </tns:createPlayerRequest>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>'

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/player-service">
   <soapenv:Body>
      <tns:createPlayerRequest>
         <player>
            <name>Erling Haaland</name>
            <country>Norway</country>
            <club>Manchester City</club>
            <position>Forward</position>
            <age>23</age>
            <isActive>true</isActive>
            <statistics>
               <season>2023-2024</season>
               <goals>20</goals>
               <assists>5</assists>
               <matches>25</matches>
               <yellowCards>2</yellowCards>
               <redCards>0</redCards>
               <minutesPlayed>2250</minutesPlayed>
            </statistics>
            <awards>
               <awardName>Premier League Golden Boot</awardName>
               <year>2023</year>
               <category>Top Scorer</category>
            </awards>
         </player>
      </tns:createPlayerRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://example.com/player-service">
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ns:bulkCreatePlayersRequest>
         <players>
            <!-- Player 1 -->
            <player>
               <name>Lionel Messi</name>
               <country>Argentina</country>
               <club>Inter Miami</club>
               <position>Forward</position>
               <age>36</age>
               <isActive>true</isActive>
               <statistics>
                  <season>2023</season>
                  <goals>25</goals>
                  <assists>15</assists>
                  <matches>30</matches>
                  <yellowCards>2</yellowCards>
                  <redCards>0</redCards>
                  <minutesPlayed>2700</minutesPlayed>
               </statistics>
               <awards>
                  <awardName>Ballon d Or</awardName>
                  <year>2023</year>
                  <category>Best Player</category>
               </awards>
            </player>
            <!-- Player 2 -->
            <player>
               <name>Cristiano Ronaldo</name>
               <country>Portugal</country>
               <club>Al Nassr</club>
               <position>Forward</position>
               <age>38</age>
               <isActive>true</isActive>
               <statistics>
                  <season>2023</season>
                  <goals>28</goals>
                  <assists>10</assists>
                  <matches>32</matches>
                  <yellowCards>3</yellowCards>
                  <redCards>0</redCards>
                  <minutesPlayed>2880</minutesPlayed>
               </statistics>
            </player>
            <!-- Player 3 -->
            <player>
               <name>Erling Haaland</name>
               <country>Norway</country>
               <club>Manchester City</club>
               <position>Forward</position>
               <age>23</age>
               <isActive>true</isActive>
               <statistics>
                  <season>2023</season>
                  <goals>35</goals>
                  <assists>8</assists>
                  <matches>34</matches>
                  <yellowCards>2</yellowCards>
                  <redCards>0</redCards>
                  <minutesPlayed>3060</minutesPlayed>
               </statistics>
            </player>
            <!-- Player 4 -->
            <player>
               <name>Kevin De Bruyne</name>
               <country>Belgium</country>
               <club>Manchester City</club>
               <position>Midfielder</position>
               <age>32</age>
               <isActive>true</isActive>
               <statistics>
                  <season>2023</season>
                  <goals>10</goals>
                  <assists>25</assists>
                  <matches>30</matches>
                  <yellowCards>4</yellowCards>
                  <redCards>0</redCards>
                  <minutesPlayed>2700</minutesPlayed>
               </statistics>
            </player>
            <!-- Player 5 -->
            <player>
               <name>Kylian Mbappe</name>
               <country>France</country>
               <club>PSG</club>
               <position>Forward</position>
               <age>24</age>
               <isActive>true</isActive>
               <statistics>
                  <season>2023</season>
                  <goals>30</goals>
                  <assists>12</assists>
                  <matches>35</matches>
                  <yellowCards>3</yellowCards>
                  <redCards>0</redCards>
                  <minutesPlayed>3150</minutesPlayed>
               </statistics>
            </player>
            <!-- Player 6 -->
            <player>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/player-service">
    <soap:Body>
        <tns:bulkCreatePlayersRequest>
            <players>
                <name>Lionel Messi</name>
                <country>Argentina</country>
                <club>Inter Miami</club>
                <position>Forward</position>
                <age>36</age>
                <isActive>true</isActive>
                <statistics>
                    <season>2023</season>
                    <goals>25</goals>
                    <assists>15</assists>
                    <matches>30</matches>
                    <yellowCards>2</yellowCards>
                    <redCards>0</redCards>

            <players>

                </award>
            </players>
            <players>
                <name>Erling Haaland</name>
                <country>Norway</country>
                <club>Manchester City</club>

                <age>23</age>

                    <matches>32</matches>

                    <redCards>0</redCards>

                </statistics>
                <award>
                    <awardName>Premier League Golden Boot</awardName>

                </award>
            </players>
            <players>
                <name>Kylian Mbappe</name>

            <players>

                <age>32</age>
